Traits.Name: Lure of the Screen
Traits.Content: Targets within 30 ft. must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be compelled to walk toward the Ad-specter in a trance, ignoring any danger.

Traits.Name: Consume Glow
Traits.Content: When the Ad-specter grapples a victim, that creature takes 10 (3d6) necrotic damage and 10 (3d6) psychic damage, leaving their skin faintly glowing afterward.

Traits.Name: Phased into Screens
Traits.Content: As a bonus action, the Ad-specter can vanish into an electronic billboard, neon sign, or monitor within 10 ft., reappearing from another screen up to 60 ft. away.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Ad-specter makes three attacks: one with its Glitch Claws and two with its Radiant Drain.

Actions.Name: Glitch Claws
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be blinded until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Radiant Drain
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (1d8 + 3 + 1d8) radiant damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it suffers disadvantage on its next attack roll, as it becomes overwhelmed by flickering lights.

Actions.Name: Hypnotic Pulse
Actions.Content: The Ad-specter channels the glowing light within it to create a mesmerizing aura. Each creature within 30 ft. must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or take 10 (2d6 + 3) psychic damage and be charmed until the end of the Ad-specter's next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half the damage and isn't charmed.
